channel.title: AI TrendWatch
channel.description: Your weekly digest of AI breakthroughs, big tech moves, and emerging trends that matter

item.title: Issue #1 - The Week AI Went Everywhere
item.description: From fusion reactors to your living room: HEAT-ML breakthrough accelerates fusion plasma protection, Amazon and Google unveil AI-first device ecosystems, Apple pivots to AI glasses, and edge intelligence reshapes manufacturing and public safety.
